name: The Drop
description:
Created as a part of Ptbo Game Jam 02 in Feb 2017. This was a solo project.

Escape your tower

Your loyal subjects have begun trumpeting for you.
Can you make it from your ivory tower to heed their call?

Things aren't always as they seem...

Controls

  • Look with the Mouse
  • Movement: WASD
  • ESC if can't you take it anymore!
